forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 11am. Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 5 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock unveils another day in Downtown San Francisco, the morning greets us with the remnants of patchy fog, a gentle reminder of the city’s maritime embrace. The sun, climbing steadily, begins to reclaim its domain, casting golden rays that promise a high near 72, before an afternoon coolness descends to a more temperate 70, pleasantly cradled by the West Southwest winds, which hum softly between 10 to 17 mph. The world outside holds the sparkle of clarity; yet, if one glances toward the Bay, tendrils of fog remain, shrouding the distant outlines of the Golden Gate. 

Tonight, the skies will unveil their stars in the midst of a nocturnal calm, with temperatures gently falling to around 59. A light jacket or a snug sweater would harmonize beautifully with the mild evening air, perfect for an idyllic stroll along the Embarcadero or an intimate gathering at a local café, where the warmth of shared stories mingles with the cooler breeze. The day unfolds beautifully—an ideal canvas for leisurely pursuits, be it exploring the charm of hidden alleys or savoring the vibrant energy at the Ferry Building. Embrace this splendid day, where the fog hints at the ocean's presence while the sun beckons you to cherish every sunlit moment.
